title: Pamolive to reward lucky fan with US$7,500 in photo contest
text:
Source: Ghana | Myjoyonline.com Date: 12-10-2015 Time: 08:10:41:pm 
Colgate Pamolive, a renowned oral care and beauty company is seeking to reward a lucky fan through its ‘Face of Palmolive 2015’ competition. 
The online-only pageant, which was launched last month, follows similar competition held in Zambia, Malawi, Angola and Kenya. 
According to the organizers, the contest which is open to ladies 18 and above requires that interested persons take a selfie with any Palmolive product making sure the product can be seen. 
They will then have to log on to www.faceofpalmovlive.com , enter their details - name, phone number, email address and the type of product they purchased. 
“There is also a barcode on the product, enter the number on the barcode and upload your picture that goes onto the platform, talk to friends and family to go and like the picture on the page.” 
The winner will receive a prize package worth US$ 7,500. 
Development Manager for Colgate Palmolive Ghana, Edward Sonkor, said in a press release that, “The Face of Palmolive is a truly fair and transparent contest.” 
Colgate Palmolive officially set up in Ghana in 2013 and has undertaken several exciting interventions to promote oral and beauty care and health.
